Text: Nice job! however can't test it myself ... but better put in description that this is for NTSC-U only Wii's ;)

Thanks, For Pal wii I think you can change the region of the nand by replace the setting.txt check here for the file :

http://wiibrew.org/wiki/System_Setting_Replace_Mod

Overwrite the settings.txt in "title\00000001\00000002\data" of the Nand. 

To be tested
